name: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin
description: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin is a new, old school game based on the classic Dark Horse Comic Graphic Novel by Stan Sakai, and seen in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles over the years. This is an old school, simple, fun Retro brawler done in the vein of the classic TMNT Stand Up Arcade game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete Graphics Card w/512 MB, Open GL 2.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: The game isnt entirely horrid but I can only recommend for Usagi fans only. The best thing about the game is the art but the combat/ai is horrid, unegaging and its almost impossible to die. Its a pure masher and most of the time the enemies are too dumb to even get on the same line as you to attack you properly and are no threat. Gameplay sucks basically and overall this manages to be worse than the C64 game released in the 80s.  Waste of the stellar art.
